author: Gabriel Robert
text:
Each time you try something, you don't fail. You just find another way that won't work. Keep trying. Secret of success is to consider no matter what happened, it's a success. What is failure to others is feedback to you.
***

author: Gabriel Robert
text: You get what you want because you work for it. Because you’re in charge of your life. Because you’re a fighter who knows when to throw punches & when to roll with them. Sometimes you break rules, sometimes you follow rules, but always on your terms. And, because you never quit.**

author: Gabriel Robert
text:
More successful you get, fewer real friends you will have. Because everyone you know may want you to be successful, but they don't want you to be more successful than they are.
****

author: Gabriel Robert
text: First figure out what you want. Then do what you have to do. And, never quit. That's enough to take you wherever you want to get to.

author: Gabriel Robert
text: No matter how you feel, start your day by saying to yourself: “Why am I so lucky?” Say it aloud now.***
